alert.note: Alert for Inland Volusia; Northern Lake County; Seminole (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued March 30 at 7:59AM EDT until March 30 at 10:00AM EDT by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM EDT THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Visibility one quarter mile or less in dense fog. * WHERE...Inland Volusia, Northern Lake and Seminole Counties. * WHEN...Until 10 AM EDT this morning. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Motorists, especially those on Interstate 4 from Sanford to Daytona Beach, should prepare to encounter rapid reductions in visibility. When driving in fog, reduce your speed, use only your low beam headlights, and leave extra distance between your vehicle and the one in front of you.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.

area.areaDesc: Inland Volusia; Northern Lake County; Seminole
